definitions.definition: Arranged , regular combat between two private persons , often over a matter of honor .
Historically, the wager of battle (judicial combat).
Any battle or struggle between two contending persons , forces , groups , or ideas .

main_definition: Arranged , regular combat between two private persons , often over a matter of honor .
secondary_definitions: Historically, the wager of battle (judicial combat).
( by extension ) Any battle or struggle between two contending persons , forces , groups , or ideas .
